restart.title: Restart Time

restartday.title: Restart Day
restartday.description: The day of the week upon which to restart. e.g. 'monday'. Leave blank for daily.

remotescheduleurl.description: The URL of the JSON formatted schedule.

schedulepollinterval.title: Remote Schedule Poll Interval
schedulepollinterval.description: How often to check for an updated schedule.

url.title: Content URL(s)

tokenserver.title: Token Server URL
tokenserver.description: URL to fetch additional tokens from as JSON.

customtoken.title: Custom Token JSON
customtoken.description: Stringified JSON object including additional tokens.

whitelist.title: Content Domain Whitelist
whitelist.description: When specified, will only allow content on these domains.
